title: View Driving Licence
description: Sign-in pages for view driving licence

parent.description: Find out what information DVLA holds about your driving licence or create a check code to share your driving record, for example to hire a car
parent.title: View or share your driving licence information

options.text: Use your driving licence and National Insurance number
options.hint_text: Your driving licence must have been issued in England, Scotland or Wales.
You can use an existing identity account or create a new one. It usually takes about 5 minutes to create an account.
